comment: unpossessed dwe ‘mister’ as a generic noun or form of address
unpossessed nu ‘lady, Mrs.’ as a generic noun or form of address
no dedicated term, either the same term as for ‘elder brother’ oder nakahã ‘relative’ is used for any of the males of this category
no dedicated term, either the same term as for ‘elder sister’ or nakahã ‘relative’ is used for any of the females of this category
